channel.title: recipes on Haruaki TAMADA
channel.description: Recent content in recipes on Haruaki TAMADA

item.title: :beers: Homebrew
item.description: ðŸ—£ Overview Tamada’s homebrew receipes. Following receipes are available. rrh Git repository manager. Histories 1.2.0: 2020-04-24, add open subcommand. 1.1.0: 2019-12-18, add group info subcommand. 1.0.4: 2019-07-13, introduce --dry-run option for rrh-new subcommand. 1.0.3: 2019-06-29, print belonging groups on running rrh repository info. 1.0.2: 2019-06-29, introduce rrh-new external subcommand. 1.0.1: 2019-06-26, fixed invalid command results on rrh group. 1.0.0: 2019-06-18, the first public release. uniq2 Extended uniq.
